description:
Reentrancy in Bridge.transferToErc(ICommon.ValidatorSetArgs,ICommon.Signature[],ICommon.RelayProof) (src/Bridge.sol#72-106):
	External calls:
	- IVault(vaultAddress).batchTransferToErc20(relayProof.transfers) (src/Bridge.sol#101)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- transferToErc20Nonce = relayProof.batchNonce + 1 (src/Bridge.sol#103)
	Bridge.transferToErc20Nonce (src/Bridge.sol#27) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- Bridge.transferToErc20Nonce (src/Bridge.sol#27)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [Bridge.transferToErc(ICommon.ValidatorSetArgs,ICommon.Signature[],ICommon.RelayProof)](src/Bridge.sol#L72-L106):
	External calls:
	- [IVault(vaultAddress).batchTransferToErc20(relayProof.transfers)](src/Bridge.sol#L101)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [transferToErc20Nonce = relayProof.batchNonce + 1](src/Bridge.sol#L103)
	[Bridge.transferToErc20Nonce](src/Bridge.sol#L27) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [Bridge.transferToErc20Nonce](src/Bridge.sol#L27)

description:
Reentrancy in Bridge.upgrade(ICommon.ValidatorSetArgs,ICommon.Signature[],address,uint256) (src/Bridge.sol#157-176):
	External calls:
	- proxy.upgradeContract(bridge,_to) (src/Bridge.sol#173)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- upgradeNonce = _nonce (src/Bridge.sol#175)
	Bridge.upgradeNonce (src/Bridge.sol#33) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- Bridge.upgrade(ICommon.ValidatorSetArgs,ICommon.Signature[],address,uint256) (src/Bridge.sol#157-176)
	- Bridge.upgradeNonce (src/Bridge.sol#33)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [Bridge.upgrade(ICommon.ValidatorSetArgs,ICommon.Signature[],address,uint256)](src/Bridge.sol#L157-L176):
	External calls:
	- [proxy.upgradeContract(bridge,_to)](src/Bridge.sol#L173)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [upgradeNonce = _nonce](src/Bridge.sol#L175)
	[Bridge.upgradeNonce](src/Bridge.sol#L33) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [Bridge.upgrade(ICommon.ValidatorSetArgs,ICommon.Signature[],address,uint256)](src/Bridge.sol#L157-L176)
	- [Bridge.upgradeNonce](src/Bridge.sol#L33)

description:
